title: Ecommerce App
description: This is a fully functional Full-Stack Ecommerce project that provides:
functionalities: Full front-end and back-end development, as well as the design and implementation of the database.
Implementation of a REST API to facilitate communication between different parts of the application.
Complete user management with registration and login functionalities, and update of user account info.
Implementation of a shopping cart and checkout process.

title: Titanic Predictor Game
description: This project is a Python-based application that predicts the survival of a fictional passenger aboard the Titanic based on user-provided characteristics.
functionalities: Graphical User Interface (GUI): The application provides an easy-to-use GUI for entering passenger details. Users can input passenger characteristics such as class, sex, age, number of siblings/spouses, and number of parents/children.
3 different ML models: Gradient Boosting, Random Forest and Tree Decision Classifier.
Console area that displays real-time messages, including the steps of the prediction process and any errors encountered.
When the user resizes the window, the font size of labels and entry fields adjusts dynamically to ensure an optimal user experience.

title: Company Web
description: This is a single-page application project for a company. It's built with Next JS and Tailwind CSS.

This web template is designed for a professional company that prides itself on a diverse range of services, including consulting, financial advisory, marketing, branding, and project management. The website presents a sleek, modern interface with a clean, corporate aesthetic that conveys the company's commitment to professionalism and quality.
